result.eng: O God, why did you abandon me?
result.ga: A Dhia cén fáth ar thréig tú mé
result.orig: A Dhia cén fáth ar thréig tú mé
result.html: A Dhia cén fáth ar thréig tú méO God, why did you abandon me?
result.ponchtml: A Ḋia cén fáṫ ar ṫréig tú méO God, why did you abandon me?

result.eng: Why did you not come?
result.ga: Cad chuige nár tháinig tú
result.orig: Cad chuige nár tháinig tú
result.html: Cad chuige nár tháinig túWhy did you not come?
result.ponchtml: Cad ċuige nár ṫáinig túWhy did you not come?

result.eng: Why did you do that?
result.ga: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sin
result.orig: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sin
result.html: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sinWhy did you do that?
result.ponchtml: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sinWhy did you do that?

result.eng: Why the change?
result.ga: Cén fáth an t-athrú
result.orig: Cén fáth an t-athrú
result.html: Cén fáth an t-athrúWhy the change?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ an t-aṫrúWhy the change?

result.eng: Why did you stay so long?
result.ga: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sin
result.orig: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sin
result.html: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sinWhy did you stay so long?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ ar ḟan tú ċoṁ fada sinWhy did you stay so long?

result.eng: Why do you not know?
result.ga: Cén fáth nach bhfuil a fhios agat
result.orig: Cén fáth nach bhfuil a fhios agat
result.html: Cén fáth nach bhfuil a fhios agatWhy do you not know?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ naċ ḃfuil a ḟios agatWhy do you not know?

result.eng: Why didn't you pay the fee?
result.ga: Tuige nár íoc tú an táille
result.orig: Tuige nár íoc tú an táille
result.html: Tuige nár íoc tú an táilleWhy didn't you pay the fee?
result.ponchtml: Tuige nár íoc tú an táilleWhy didn't you pay the fee?

result.eng: This is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ga: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.orig: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.html: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ponchtml: Uime sin ḋíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.

result.eng: Why?
result.ga: Cén fáth
result.orig: Cén fáth
result.html: Cén fáthWhy?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫWhy?

result.eng: Who are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]
result.ga: Cé tusa domsa
result.orig: Cé tusa domsa
result.html: Cé tusa domsaWho are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]
result.ponchtml: Cé tusa domsaWho are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]

result.eng: The reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.
result.ga: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta
result.orig: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta
result.html: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsantaThe reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.
result.ponchtml: Is é fáṫ mo ẛuime sa ċeist seo ṫar ċeisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsantaThe reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.

result.eng: According to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ga: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.orig: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.html: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis an ollaṁ níl sé soiléir in aon ċor cén fáṫ ar ṫarla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.

result.eng: If they failed, it is not known why.
result.ga: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.orig: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.html: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáthIf they failed, it is not known why.
result.ponchtml: Má ṫeip orṫu ní fios cén fáṫIf they failed, it is not known why.

result.eng: Why was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ga: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.orig: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.html: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimhWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ an raiḃ deataċ ag teaċt ó ḋá ṫaoḃ an ḟoirgniṁWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?

result.eng: And in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ga: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.orig: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.html: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ponchtml: Agus le cois sin dá mba ḃuama é cén fáṫ nár pléascaḋ gaċ taoḃ seaċas an dá ṫaoḃ aṁáinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?

result.eng: The biggest reason why Irish-language blogs have started declining is...
result.ga: An chúis is mó go bhfuil meath tagtha ar bhlaganna na Gaeilge ná
result.orig: An chúis is mó go bhfuil meath tagtha ar bhlaganna na Gaeilge ná
result.html: An chúis is mó go bhfuil meath tagtha ar bhlaganna na Gaeilge náThe biggest reason why Irish-language blogs have started declining is...
result.ponchtml: An ċúis is mó go ḃfuil meaṫ tagṫa ar ḃlaganna na Gaeilge náThe biggest reason why Irish-language blogs have started declining is...

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ga: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.orig: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.html: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuigfeá d'éinne naċ mbeaḋ ag iarraiḋ feannaḋ den ċineál sin a ṫarraingt orṫu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].

result.eng: That's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ga: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.orig: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.html: Sin an rud a thug an bealach méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ponchtml: Sin an rud a ṫug an bealaċ méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.

result.eng: Why did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ga: Cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.orig: Cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.html: Cad chuige a raibh tú domhWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ponchtml: Cad ċuige a raiḃ tú doṁWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?

result.eng: That's why I am crying.
result.ga: Sin fáth mo chaointe
result.orig: Sin fáth mo chaointe
result.html: Sin fáth mo chaointeThat's why I am crying.
result.ponchtml: Sin fáṫ mo ċaointeThat's why I am crying.

result.eng: She will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ga: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.orig: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.html: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ iontas uirṫi cad ċuige a ḃfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.

result.eng: That's why I came here.
result.ga: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealach
result.orig: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealach
result.html: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealachThat's why I came here.
result.ponchtml: Ba é sin mo ġnóiṫe an bealaċThat's why I came here.
